Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Peptide-2 (originally peptide #1; XXA; Leu-rich; natural AMPs; frog, amphibians, animals; UCLL1c)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that the sequence of the peptide shows 64.3% similarity toVmCT1.Activity:  Active against S. aureus ATCC 29213 (MIC 32 uM). Also: E-faecalis ATCC 29212 (MIC >64 uM); E-coli ATCC 25922 (MIC > 64 uM), and A-baumannii ATCC 19606 (MIC >64 uM).Discovery: Peptide #1 was initially reported in the ref for AP3035.Updated Jan2020; 7/2021; Jan2025
Literature Information.Author: Roncevic T, Krce L, Gerdol M, Pacor S, Benincasa M, Guida F, Aviani I, Cikes-Culic V, Pallavicini A, Maravic A, Tossi A. 2018
Literature Information.Reference: Biochim Biophys Acta Biomembr. 2019 March 1, 1861 (3), 651-659. doi: 10.1016/j.bbamem.2018.12.014.PubMed
Literature Information.Title: Membrane-active antimicrobial peptide identified in Rana arvalis by targeted DNA sequencing
